name: Swedish Christmas Cookies
description: Baked for the 2010 Serious Eats Cookie Swap "Another recipe borrowed from my mom, this one dating back to her childhood. I'm not sure what makes these cookies 'Swedish.'" —Rachel Heise Bolten, SE intern...
recipeIngredient: 1 cup sugar (+ sugar for rolling dough)
1 can coconut (can substitute with 1 1/3 cups bagged coconut)

recipeInstructions.text: Roll into small balls; dip into sugar. Press 1/2 candied cherry into top.
